Name: TypeOfMetadataQuality
Description: A brief statement of the metadata quality being measured. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary. Use of a controlled vocabulary is strongly recommended.

Name: MeasurePurpose
Description: The purpose of the type of metadata quality measure and its value. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: MeasureValue
Description: A value representing the measurement of this set of metadata within the context of the TypeOfMetadataQuality indicated. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: Description
Description: A textual description of the quality of this set of metadata which expands on or is provided in lieu of other objects within MetadataQuality. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.
